title: ollama/ollama
summary: Official Ollama repo: self-contained LLM runner with a REST API and CLI for macOS, Linux, and Windows.

title: ollama-python
summary: Official Python client library for Ollama, published on PyPI as `ollama`.

title: ollama-js
summary: Official JavaScript/TypeScript client for Ollama, published on npm as `ollama`.

title: langchain-ollama
summary: LangChain integration package (`langchain-ollama` on PyPI) for using Ollama models in LangChain pipelines.

title: ollama-webui
summary: Feature-rich web UI for Ollama (ChatGPT-style) with user management, RAG, and multi-model support.

title: ollama-cli
summary: Unofficial interactive CLI that wraps Ollama with conversation history and syntax highlighting.

title: ollama-copilot
summary: VS Code extension that turns Ollama models into inline code copilots.

title: ollama-helm
summary: Community-maintained Helm chart for deploying Ollama on Kubernetes clusters.

title: ollama-rag
summary: Minimal RAG template using Ollama embeddings + Chroma vector store.

title: ollama4j
summary: Java SDK for Ollama (Maven Central: `io.github.amithkoujalgi:ollama4j`).

title: ollama-haystack
summary: Haystack integration node to use Ollama models in deepset Haystack pipelines.

title: ollama-discord
summary: Discord bot that streams Ollama replies into any channel.

title: ollama-nim
summary: Nim client library for Ollama, published on Nimble as `ollama`.

title: ollama-csharp
summary: .NET client for Ollama (NuGet: `OllamaSharp`) with async streaming.

title: ollama-rust
summary: Rust crate (`ollama-rs`) providing strongly-typed bindings to the Ollama API.

title: ollama-dagger
summary: Dagger pipeline example that spins up Ollama containers for CI testing.

title: ollama-gpt4all-ui
summary: GPT4All chat UI fork that can also connect to local Ollama instances.

title: ollama-telegram
summary: Telegram bot template that proxies chats to Ollama with per-user model selection.

title: ollama-go
summary: Early community Go client for Ollama (archived, superseded by official repo).

title: ollama-models
summary: Registry of community-submitted Modelfiles for Ollama (Llama 3, Mistral, CodeLlama, etc.).
